edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos

Class AbstractPaxosLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.AbstractPaxosLogger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLPaxosLogger

    public abstract class AbstractPaxosLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    V. Arun

    This abstract class exists to make the logger pluggable. An example is a quick and dirty, fake, memory-based logger DummyPaxosLogger that was implemented long back but has been deprecated now. Use DerbyPaxosLogger that extends this class for a more scalable, efficient, and persistent logger.

      • initiateReadCheckpoints

        public abstract boolean initiateReadCheckpoints(boolean b)
        Prepares a cursor in the DB so that the caller can start reading checkpoints one at a time. Cursor-based checkpoint reading is useful under recovery when a very large number of checkpoints may have to be read and restored sequentially.
        Parameters:
        b -
        Returns:
        Returns true if the cursor to start reading checkpoints is successfully created.

      • readNextCheckpoint

        public abstract RecoveryInfo readNextCheckpoint(boolean b)
        Reads the next checkpoint after the cursor has been created by initiateReadCheckpoints(boolean).
        Parameters:
        b -
        Returns:
        The next retrieved checkpoint.

      • initiateReadMessages

        public abstract boolean initiateReadMessages()
        Returns:
        Starts a cursor for sequentially reading all log messages across all paxos groups from the database in order to replay them. This one-pass recovery is much faster than replaying log messages for each paxos group one at a time.

      • readNextMessage

        public abstract PaxosPacket readNextMessage()
        Reads the next log message after the cursor has been initialized by initiateReadMessages().
        Returns:
        Returns the next log message.

      • closeReadAll

        public abstract void closeReadAll()
        Closes the recovery cursor.

      • closeImpl

        public abstract void closeImpl()
        Closes all connections to the database. The database can not be used beyond this point.

      • getLoggedMessages

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<PaxosPacket> getLoggedMessages(java.lang.String paxosID)
        Gets a list of all logged messages for the paxos group paxosID. Used by rollForward. We don't need to bother about the version here because non-version-compliant logged messages if any will be rejected by the paxos instance anyway.
        Parameters:
        paxosID -
        Returns:
        The list of logged messages for the paxos group paxosID.

                                                                               int version,
                                                                               int firstSlot,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer maxSlot)
        We must supply the version here for safety.
        Parameters:

        version -
        firstSlot -
        maxSlot -
        Returns:
        A map of logged ACCEPTs indexed by their integer slot numbers.
